title: Light Bulb Puzzle
description: A challenging logic puzzle game where you need to light up all the bulbs! Click on bulbs to toggle them on and off, but beware - clicking one bulb affects its neighbors. Find the strategy to illuminate every bulb in the fewest moves possible!
controls: Click on bulbs to toggle them on or off. When you click a bulb, it and its adjacent bulbs will change state. Light up all bulbs to win!
author: LightGame Team
features: Step counter to track your efficiency
